channel.title: There's been Delta, Devo, Czar.. Heard of ProdigyX?
channel.description:
FORGET IT. Delta can go to hell, the base is literally shit. Its so messy, I cant even recode anything due to the fact that shit is sprawled everywhere. I cant do any of this shit, its all garbage. Ill just use a basic base and make my way through.. Ill still create the Nexus base but it will be all neat and recoded. Thank god you guys opened my eyes... Delta IS shit.
The story: Alright, basically this is going to be a playable server that will be updated almost every day. I will basically keep editing this source and have it pretty awesome, so it will be more like a scattered server (in scattered I mean shops wont be all in the home area, teleports will be available, shops scattered, no training area, I rather call it training area everywhere since there will be NPC's everywhere.) All teleports will come to use, either looking for shops or NPC's to train on.
Also, the whole RuneScape world will come to use. There wont be any place thats on the teleport list that wont be used, every single one will have its own reserved spot of interest. EX: Crafting found at Varrock tower, Herblore near rimmington, etc.
So, if anyone wants to help, details on the bottom.
New base: Nexus.
Base startout use: iClarity (Credits to Primadude from Mopar)
Modified things: New client cache.
Things being modified: [s]Better client cache.[/s] New shops. Home area. Train area.
Things that will be modified: [s]Better client cache.[/s] New trading system. [s]New shops. Home area. Train area.[/s] Npc spawning/emote re-do. Player saving redone. All skills added/redone. More handlers to reduce lag. Less uneeded crap. Minigames made/remade. Duel arena. Pest control monsters. New interfaces. New teleport graphics. Crafting. Better thieving. Melee, range, and magic skills remade. Fully working dueling.
Alright guys. Thats about it, I will be posting alot of more crap on here, so keep updated. If you want to help, simply add my MSN: Michael-xx@live.com. This is going to be a base, like Czar, Delta, iClarity, except with no glitches and more RuneScape-like.
Want to help? I need help, people. I cant do all of this all by myself. I have a VPS, forums, etc... But I need helpers. I can do the coding for the server, I already have someone helping me with that, but I need people to help with the client coding. I cant do that part becouse the server is already on my mind. So, I would use the DropBox program to share the files and develop everything.
We would eventually release the server to the community, ofcourse giving credits to everyone who helped in any way. So, please PM me on Mopar (here) or email me. Thanks.
Positions available:
Server coders: TAKEN TAKEN
Client coders: OPEN OPEN
Modelers: OPEN OPEN
Heres the progress bar:
[u][s][b]| | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | | |[/b][/s][/u]

item.title: There's been Delta, Devo, Czar.. Heard of ProdigyX?
item.dc:creator: @XxMichaelxX XxMichaelxX
item.description:
@XxMichaelxX wrote:

Thanks guys, im coding from about 2 hours now… Hadnt had a break. I deleted all trade, following, attack, ranging, and maging methods… Basically a blank source that you can only chat on. I remade mining and woodcutting, now its based on how many players are cutting the tree you are and what your level is. You get the goods (ores or logs) faster if you have a bigger level, so a lvl 60 wcer will get logs faster then lets say a level 10 wcer.

Read full topic

item.title: There's been Delta, Devo, Czar.. Heard of ProdigyX?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Ive been hearing all of the talking of Delta being a messy coder and everything he does is garbage. Well, I personally like Delta, I tend to know him from a while back.. So, I made this deal with him: If I can top his Delta base with my base (Remaking the skills, pk areas, shops, I mean everything), he will personally do something that I dont want to tell you guys at this moment.. It will be a surprise.

A surprise? Wtf.

A) Delta is an awful coder, what could he even offer you?
B) Delta all he did was add some skills, and minigames, Bakatool was the main person who wrote Delta.
C) This won’t go far from what I read, as you have no proof of what you are fixing. Or what you are planning to fix.

Also, when you said people say its messy, ect. It is VERY messy. Use netbeans, and it will fix its messiness up. But you’ll need to delete just about 75% to make it a good base.

Delta without screw ups isn’t delta.

Read full topic
